titleStmt.title: To the Right Honourable and Honourable the Lords Commissioners of His Majesties treasury Sir William Creagh ...
titleStmt.author: Creagh, William, Sir.

notesStmt.note: Folded leaf inserted between p. 8 and 9 titled: The French certificate.
Folded leaf inserted between p. 20 and 21 titled: The Scotch certificate.
Reproduction of original in Columbia University Library.

Collection of documents sent by Creagh, along with his cover letter dated 1687, to the Lords of the Treasury. They deal with the diversion of the foreign trade in coal from Newcastle to Scotland owing to higher export duty in England.
